official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that telephone directories within the eastern and midwestern United States should include information relating to natural disaster survival techniques.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that telephone directories within the eastern and midwestern United States should include a natural disaster survival guide. Provides that Federal, State, and local disaster management agencies should establish effective mechanisms to respond to citizen inquiries in natural disasters and periodically distribute to the public survival guide information.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that telephone directories within the eastern and midwestern United States should include information relating to natural disaster survival techniques.
